alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued April 03 at 9:27AM PDT until April 04 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT TUESDAY FOR PYRAMID LAKE... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Waves 2 to 4 feet. * WHERE...Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve. Lake waters will be rough, and small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
